Job Title: Senior Manufacturing Planner
Company: Lee Ltd

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Manufacturing Planner to join our team at Lee Ltd. The successful candidate will be responsible for planning, coordinating, and controlling the production process to ensure efficient and timely delivery of products.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement production schedules to meet customer demand
- Analyze production data to identify areas for improvement
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to resolve production issues
- Ensure compliance with safety and quality regulations

Qualifications:
- 5+ years of experience in manufacturing planning
- Bachelor's degree in Industrial Engineering, Operations Management, or related field
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
- Must have excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Preference for candidates who share our cultural background

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for career growth and professional development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
